definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Christopher Marlowe is one of the outstanding representatives of English Renaissance dramatists.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯托弗马洛是文艺复兴时期英国戏剧的杰出代表。

sentences.english: Real Mallorca striker Dani Guiza admits he fancies a move to Roma.
sentences.chinese: 马洛卡前锋古伊萨承认他梦想加盟罗马。

sentences.english: My Chinese name is Lei Chen, u guys can just call me Mallory.
sentences.chinese: 我的中文名字叫陈雷，大家也可以叫我马洛里。

sentences.english: Mallory dreamed of being the first man to climb Mount Everest.
sentences.chinese: 马洛里曾梦想成为第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的人。

sentences.english: Having a great time here in Mallorca. Neil.
sentences.chinese: 我们在马洛卡玩得很开心，尼尔。

sentences.english: Multani cannot be the target of spells or abilities. "To make peace with the forest, make peace with me. ? ─Multani, to UrzaIllus."
sentences.chinese: 马洛术士穆塔尼不能成为咒语或异能的目标。
马洛和圣埃斯皮里图是。

sentences.english: Flamingos standing together are reflected in a pond at the Bird Zoo in Marlow, eastern Germany.
sentences.chinese: 红鹤群起站立在德国东部马洛池塘边，形成倒影。

sentences.english: Malloy always talked hard, but he had a soft , womanish face.
sentences.chinese: 马洛伊说话很严厉，但有一张温厚的女人似的脸。

sentences.english: Or the one-shouldered white cocktail number that she paired this summer in Mallorca with the chunky necklace?
sentences.chinese: 或是今夏在马洛卡单肩白色鸡尾酒会装配短粗项链？

sentences.english: Customers wait in a busy shop in a market in Palma, Mallorca.
sentences.chinese: 客户在一间繁忙位于马洛卡帕尔马市场的店边。

sentences.english: My flight was scheduled to stopover in Mallorca and then continue to Hamburg.
sentences.chinese: 偶的航班预定是在马洛卡停一下然后再飞到汉堡。

sentences.english: Even with Marlow, you feel that he never lets you know what's really in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 马洛也一样，感觉他不会让你明白他的心。

sentences.english: Marlowe stinks like a smoked fish.
sentences.chinese: 马洛身上散发出一股熏鱼似的气味。

sentences.english: Marlowe was killed by a man whom he was treacherously trying to stab.
sentences.chinese: 马洛背信弃义正想捅死一人，结果被那人所杀。

sentences.english: He was a member of the Footlights and the president of the Marlowe Society.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个成员脚灯和主席马洛社会。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
